data.title: Universidad Técnica Estatal de Quevedo: Facultad de Ciencias de La Ingeniería
data.meta_description: Grammar 6 Would Like - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides a grammar lesson on using the phrase "would like" followed by an infinitive or gerund. It explains that "would like" is used to express wanting or preference, and must be followed by an object, gerund, or infinitive. Examples are given for both affirmative and negative constructions of "would like" in both singular and plural forms. Common question structures using "would like" are also presented.
data.text: Universidad Técnica Estatal de Quevedo: Facultad de Ciencias de La Ingeniería
